pageProduct.name: Only Good Soothe Hand Wash 300ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

100% Natural and Palm Oil Free Hand Wash

Warnings

If irritation occurs, discontinue use. For sensitive skin, patch test first. If product gets into eyes rinse immediately with clean water.

Common Uses

Hand Wash

Ingredients

Water, Sodium Coco Sulfate (Derived From Coconut), Coco Glucoside (Derived From Coconut), Betaine (Derived From Sugar Beet), Glycerin (Derived From Non-Gmo Rapeseed), Cocoamidopropyl Betaine (Derived From Coconut), Sodium Chloride, Althaea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Root Extract, Sambucus Nigra (Elderflower) Flower Extract, Rosa Canina (Fruit) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Phormium Tenax (Harakeke) Leaf Juice, Sodium Phytate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Fragrance.

Directions

Apply generously onto wet hands. Lather well and rinse.
